description: Microsoft has published a "Cyber Signals" report sharing new information about the hacking group Storm-0539 and a sharp rise in gift card theft as we approach the Memorial Day holiday in the United States. [...]
title: Microsoft spots gift card thieves using cyber-espionage tactics

description: GitLab patched a high-severity vulnerability that unauthenticated attackers could exploit to take over user accounts in cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. [...]
title: High-severity GitLab flaw lets attackers take over accounts

description: Security researchers reverse-engineered Apple's recent iOS 17.5.1 update and found that a recent bug that restored images deleted months or even years ago was caused by an iOS bug and not an issue with iCloud. [...]
title: Apple wasn’t storing deleted iOS photos in iCloud after all

description: UK's Information Commissioner Office (ICO) has announced the intention to impose a fine of £750,000 ($954,000) on the Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI) for exposing the entire workforce's personal details by inadvertently publishing a spreadsheet file online. [...]
title: Northern Ireland police faces £750k fine after exposing staff info

description: A massive Microsoft outage in some regions affects Bing.com, Copilot for web and mobile, Copilot in Windows, ChatGPT internet search and DuckDuckGo. [...]
title: Microsoft outage affects Bing, Copilot, DuckDuckGo and ChatGPT internet search
